subject: Order cancelled
description_text:
Hello, I would like to cancel my order #SSN4759 immediately. The order has not been fulfilled yet, and I no longer wish to proceed. Please confirm the cancellation and issue a full refund as soon as possible. Thank you

Von meinem iPhone gesendet

conversations.body_text: Hi Tobias Raudaschl,    Your order was originally scheduled for shipment from our German warehouse, but due to transportation delays, the goods arrived later than expected. They have now arrived at the warehouse, and we are arranging for them to be stocked and shipped via DHL Express. May I confirm your cancellation request?

No, if they arrived i dont want to cancell,
Thanks for your Information.
Von meinem iPhone gesendet
